alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 6:46PM EDT until June 06 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.9 to 5.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 06/02 AM 4.7/ 5.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.0/ 1.5 2-3 Minor 06/03 PM 3.5/ 4.0 -0.2/ 0.3 0.8/ 1.3 1-2 None 07/03 AM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 0.8/ 1.3 1-2 Minor 07/04 PM 3.6/ 4.1 0.0/ 0.5 0.8/ 1.3 2 None 08/04 AM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 0.8/ 1.3 1-2 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
